DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's teamwork activity feed.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read your teamwork activity feed.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all users' teamwork activity feed
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all users' teamwork activity feed, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Send a teamwork activity as the user
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to create new notifications in users' teamwork activity feeds on behalf of the signed in user. These notifications may not be discoverable or be held or governed by compliance policies.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to create new activities in your teamwork activity feed, and send new activities to other users' activity feed, on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Send a teamwork activity to any user
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create new notifications in users' teamwork activity feeds without a signed in user. These notifications may not be discoverable or be held or governed by compliance policies.
